document.full_text: although the autopen, a mechanical signature-producing device, has been in wide use for decades, it had apparently never been used to sign a bill into law before.
document.title: making legislative history, with nod from obama and stroke of an autopen
lines_and_colors: although the autopen, a mechanical signature-producing device, has been in wide use for decades, it had apparently never been used to sign a bill into law before.
